item.title: Flere penge til forskningen
item.description: Op-ed in Berlingske April 10, 2019 (with Mogens Høgh Jensen and Lars Arge, the Royal Danish Academy of Sciences and Letters, and Jens Kehlet Nørskov and Søren Peter Olesen, the Danish National Research Foundation) Read it here ($paywalled & in Danish)
